example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 当然)) (PU ，) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VV 想) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 卖) (NP-OBJ (NN 知识))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 需要) (VP (VP (BA 将) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 知识)) (VP (VP (VV 化为) (NP-OBJ (NN 步骤))) (PU ，) (VP (QP-ADV (CD 一) (CLP (M 步步))) (VP (VV 标准化) (PU 、) (VV 系统化)))))) (PU ，) (CC 并且) (VP (VV 赋予) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 鲜明))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 外在) (NN 形象)))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 再)) (PP-MNR (P 藉著) (NP (CP (WHNP (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (VP (VA 周延))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 商标) (NN 专利)))) (VP (MSP 来) (VP (VV 吓阻) (NP-OBJ (NN 模仿者))))))))
